General.Name: Astino Bhd
General.Description: Astino Berhad, an investment holding company, manufactures, processes, trades, and sells in metal building materials and other steel products under the Astino brand name in Malaysia, Indonesia, the Philippines, and internationally. The company offers metal roofing, c-purlin, small c-purlin, truss and batten, piping, scaffolding, and slitting and levelling coils, as well as agro facilities and related products. It also manufactures and sells insect screens and other building related products. In addition, the company designs, constructs, manufactures, and sells poultry house and equipment systems. Astino Berhad was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Penang, Malaysia.
